授業目的:
The purpose of this course is to give students experience of writing an extended academic essay
The purpose of this course is to show students how to be an independent researcher/writer
到達目標:
Students will be able to understand the necessary planning stages for writing an academic essay
Students will be able to research information needed for their topic
授業方法:
Individual work
Information for students permitted to take classes online.
Online study can be completed by writing/researching at home and sending me the work for feedback. A zoom meeting between the student and teacher must be scheduled at least once per week. This time can be negotiated by the student and teacher through an email in week 1. Zoom meetings will be offered as support for students working from home.
